page:body.h1: No TinyMCE installation was found on your system.
page:body.p: Due to license incompatibilites, TinyMCE (released under the GPL) cannot be distributed with Lenya (released under the Apache License 2.0), although it is perfectly legal for you to use them together.

Please download the TinyMCE editor from moxiecode.com.
Lenya's TinyMCE module is compatible with TinyMCE 3.0.x. Unpack the zip archive or tarball in your Lenya source tree under $LENYA-SRC/src/modules/tinymce/resources. Alternatively, you can install it to $PUB_HOME/lenya/modules/tinymce/resources (if you prefer not to have external code in your Lenya source tree), since all calls to this code are fallback-enabled.

By default, TinyMCE comes with an English localization only. If you prefer another language, you can download additional language catalogues. Unpack them in your Lenya source tree under $LENYA-SRC/src/modules/tinymce/resources/tinymce/jscripts/tiny_mce, or $PUB_HOME/lenya/modules/tinymce/resources/tinymce/jscripts/tiny_mce, respectively.
Depending on the setting of the "modules.copy" option in local.build.properties you will have to rebuild Lenya before you can use TinyMCE.

No further setup is required, but if you want to fine-tune TinyMCE, edit modules/tinymce/resources/javascript/tiny_config.js.
Refer to the excellent TinyMCE documentation for details.
Thanks to the crew at moxiecode for a capable, exceptionally clean, well-packaged and extensively documented open-source editor! Enjoy.
